links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = replace digits d > 6 by d + 1 in base-9 representation of n - 1. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 07 2014
prog: (MAGMA) [ n: n in [0..89] | not 7 in Intseq(n) ];  // _Bruno Berselli_, May 28 2011(sh) seq 0 1000 | grep -v 7; # _Joerg Arndt_, May 29 2011(Haskell)a052419 = f . subtract 1 where   f 0 = 0   f v = 10 * f w + if r > 6 then r + 1 else r  where (w, r) = divMod v 9-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 07 2014(PARI) lista(nn) = {for (n=0, nn, if (!vecsearch(vecsort(digits(n),,8), 7), print1(n, ", ")););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 22 2015
crossrefs: Cf. A052382 (without 0), A052383 (without 1), A052404 (without 2), A052405 (without 3), A052406 (without 4), A052413 (without 5), A052414 (without 6), A052421 (without 8), A007095 (without 9).
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Mar 13 2000
